title: Roast Pork
ingredients: ['2 tablespoons vegetable oil', '1 tablespoon mustard', '2 tablespoons caraway seeds', '1 tablespoon garlic granules', '1 tablespoon salt', '2 teaspoons ground black pepper', '1 (2.25kg) whole pork shoulder roast', '3 medium onions, chopped', '125ml beer', '1 tablespoon cornflour', '30g butter']
